t: Check out this Amazon review of Polar ICE Pitcher with Aluminum Polar ICE Chamber (Crystal Clear/Brushed Aluminum Ice Chamber)
s: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He take the beer from kegs and pours it into the pitcher. Stays cold for hours! It's fantastic! The plastic is great quality & nice and clear. It's lightweight & easy to clean. It pours nice and smooth. Totally recommend this product!
